scripts.dev: npx --no-install rimraf dist && concurrently "npm run dev:electron" "npm run dev:react"
scripts.dev:react: npx --no-install cross-env NODE_ENV=development && npx --no-install webpack-cli --config ./webpack/react.config.js --mode development --progress --color
scripts.dev:electron: npx --no-install cross-env NODE_ENV=development && npx --no-install webpack-cli --config ./webpack/electron.config.js --mode development --progress --color
scripts.prod: npx --no-install rimraf dist && concurrently "npm run prod:electron" "npm run prod:react"
scripts.prod:react: npx --no-install cross-env NODE_ENV=production && npx --no-install webpack-cli --config ./webpack/react.config.js --mode production --progress --color
scripts.prod:electron: npx --no-install cross-env NODE_ENV=production && npx --no-install webpack-cli --config ./webpack/electron.config.js --mode production --progress --color
